```{r timeline, echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(vistime)
data <- read.csv(file="data/timeline.csv")
data$end[data$end=="present"] = as.character(Sys.Date())
vistime::vistime(data, optimize_y = TRUE, linewidth = 25)
```
